medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Mt. Rainier
marks:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscriptions, and Seal

 LLC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; LRC, in pencil: [Hiroshi Y
description: snow-covered purple and pink mountain in background; band of silhouetted pine trees in middle ground; meadow with rocks, pink and yellow blossoms, and curving river reflecting mountain in foreground
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
